731a4f72-7c68-4f77-be49-a4cdcc63b924:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — Iconoclast. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}.
c88614de-1fee-4ecf-9782-10f109cc5356: Restores <u>(12 + {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} / 3)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old Injury.

Also removes {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}. Removes one {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}fresh injury{/g}, or, if none exist, attempts to remove one old injury.
d00f9bf0-827f-40d2-83c8-1ee8ae62c62c: This item is immediately consumed, granting you 100 {g|Encyclopedia:ScrapSpace}scrap{/g}.
ea35f26b-2d3a-447a-9bb4-b720f7cc37ed: This versatile device increases the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g} by +5.
c8f0ee99-c747-4bb9-8888-8a4a63607410: Until the start of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} the target gains 50 {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and 1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g} until the end of combat.
